items.title: Iran anti-government protests spread to majority of provinces, videos show
items.description: Videos show that unrest has spread to more than 50 towns and cities, including pro-government heartlands.

items.title: Trump claims US oil firms could be 'up and running' in Venezuela within 18 months
items.description: Trump is open about his ambitions for scaled-up US operations, but analysts say such plans would take time.

items.title: European allies back Denmark over Trump's threat to annex Greenland
items.description: Donald Trump has refused to rule out using force to annex Greenland - a scenario that would spell the end of Nato, according to Denmark.

items.title: Zelensky replaces Ukraine's powerful security service chief
items.description: The Ukrainian president has come under heavy criticism for his reshuffling of one the country's most successful security agencies.

items.title: Why does Trump want Greenland and what could it mean for Nato?
items.description: The US president's repeated demands to control Greenland could threaten the Nato military alliance.
